p: Incubation period (the time from infection to the onset of symptoms) for the new pathogen varies from 2 to 14 days in human to human transmission ( 13). Furthermore, median incubation period was reported as 5-6 days (ranged from 0-14 days) in WHO report ( 14). Studies that were conducted on those who had traveled to Wuhan and Guangdong mean incubation period of 4.8 (Â±2.6) days was reported. In some other studies the mean incubation period was reported to be 6.4 days ( 15, 16), while another study in China reported longer incubation times up to 24 days ( 13).
